description: Increases all party members' DEF by 25%, lasting for 30m. (This effect only applies to your own Resonator(s) in Co-op Mode)
bgDescription: A round bun with a dragon's horn, there are a variety of flavors. Huanglong people have a special feeling for dragons, and a plate is always placed on the table during the holidays. It is said that if you eat the whole thing, you will have good luck in the coming year.
